accountManage.msg0.message: Exporting..., please do not refresh the page!

recordedClass.msg1.message: Unable to connect to the recording server! Please check whether the network or server IP is correct.

videoPlayer.vlcLoadTip.message: To check the teacher in real-time, you need to use the vlc plug-in ({downloadVlc}) and only {windows} and {ieBrower} are supported.

videoPlayer.notSupport.message: This browser does not support playback

playback.msg1.message: The video needs to be pre-processed after the lecture recording and you may need to wait.

playback.msg2.message: Optimal use environment: Operating system - Win 7 or above, MAC OS X; Browser - IE10 or above, Edge, Chrome 55 or above.

playback.msg3.message: Be cautious when editing the recording server settings. Wrong settings may cause the connected camera to be unusable. Are you sure to set up/edit the recording server?

playback.msg4.message: Failed to set! Please check whether the recording server IP or account/password is correct.

playback.msg6.message: Download the template and organize the data in the formats specified in the the template

playback.msg8.message: Classroom import is not completed - Please correct the errors in the table and upload again!

playback.msg10.message: Only one file is allowed to be uploaded

playback.msg11.message: Done! Please wait for the device.

playback.msg12.message: The best use environment: operating system Win 7 or higher; browser: IE kernel browser

playback.msg15.message: No timetable found - Click the Import Timetable button to add one!

playback.msg17.message: Please check if the URL you entered is correct, or click the button below to return to the homepage.

playback.msg20.message: The accounts were not imported - please correct the errors in the form and upload it again!

playback.msg22.message: Downloading..., please do not close this page! If there is no automatic download, please click the link to download.

playback.msg24.message: The timetable was not imported - please correct the errors in the form and upload it again!

playback.msg25.message: Downloading..., please do not close this page! If the download is successful, this page will automatically close.

courseManage.msg2.message: (1) Enable On-Demand: Click the Enable On-Demand button to make the lecture recording accessible. Students/teachers can view it on the Recording Resource Platform.

courseManage.msg3.message: (2) Associate Online Course: Associate the course to the ULMS online course. After being associated, the teachers/students of the online course can replay the lecture recording in ULMS.

courseManage.msg5.message: Please create a term, set the start time, and then import the timetable.

recordingPlan.msg1.message: Record by Timetable: The system will automatically record the lecture according to the timetable.

recordingPlan.msg2.message: Please go to Academic Administration to

recordingPlan.msg4.message: Note: If the recording schedule in the timetable is conflict with the recording in progress, the scheduled recording in the timetable will not be executed.

recordingPlan.msg5.message: The scheduled recording is in progress. Please wait until it is done.

login.thirdpartyTips.message: Can not be simulated on local, so please combine you own business simulation! ! !

permission.tips.message: In some cases, using v-permission will have no effect. For example: Element-UI  el-tab or el-table-column and other scenes that dynamically render dom. You can only do this with v-if.

guide.description.message: The guide page is useful for some people who entered the project for the first time. You can briefly introduce the features of the project. Demo is based on

components.tinymceTips.message: Rich text is a core feature of the management backend, but at the same time it is a place with lots of pits. In the process of selecting rich texts, I also took a lot of detours. The common rich texts on the market have been basically used, and I finally chose Tinymce. See the more detailed rich text comparison and introduction.

components.dropzoneTips.message: Because my business has special needs, and has to upload images to qiniu, so instead of a third party, I chose encapsulate it by myself. It is very simple, you can see the detail code in @/components/Dropzone.

components.stickyTips.message: when the page is scrolled to the preset position will be sticky on the top.

components.backToTopTips1.message: When the page is scrolled to the specified position, the Back to Top button appears in the lower right corner

components.backToTopTips2.message: You can customize the style of the button, show / hide, height of appearance, height of the return. If you need a text prompt, you can use element-ui el-tooltip elements externally

components.imageUploadTips.message: Since I was using only the vue@1 version, and it is not compatible with mockjs at the moment, I modified it myself, and if you are going to use it, it is better to use official version.

table.dynamicTips1.message: Fixed header, sorted by header order

table.dynamicTips2.message: Not fixed header, sorted by click order

example.warning.message: Creating and editing pages cannot be cached by keep-alive because keep-alive include does not currently support caching based on routes, so it is currently cached based on component name. If you want to achieve a similar caching effect, you can use a browser caching scheme such as localStorage. Or do not use keep-alive include to cache all pages directly. See details

errorLog.description.message: Now the management system are basically the form of the spa, it enhances the user experience, but it also increases the possibility of page problems, a small negligence may lead to the entire page deadlock. Fortunately Vue provides a way to catch handling exceptions, where you can handle errors or report exceptions.

theme.tips.message: Tips: It is different from the theme-pick on the navbar is two different skinning methods, each with different application scenarios. Refer to the documentation for details.

videoPlayer.pleaseCompleteSubmit.message: Please fill in all and then submit!

videoPlayer.noSaveDiscardFill.message: The review has not been saved. Are you sure to discard it?

videoPlayer.msg1.message: No courses are currently in session. You can start review 5 minutes before a session. Please wait!

videoPlayer.10MinutesClassRecorded.message: Recording can be started 10 minutes before the session

courseManage.msg29.message: Due to the limitation of the number of cameras and shooting angles, some students cannot be captured or identified. This list is for reference only.

myCourse.pleseInput.message: Click to enter the course name/ID

permisSubtitle.downloadTaskTip1.message: Multiple videos from podium, student and screen cameras are generated for lecture capture. The splicing function can combine these videos from multiple sources into one video. You can select to do so on the recording playback's download interface. It takes 30-60 minutes to splice a video, and you can check the splicing progress on this page.

permisSubtitle.demandTip1.message: The session recording playback is on-demand allowed. After the video is published, students can view the recording video on-demand.

permisSubtitle.demandTip2.message: The session recording playback is on-demand disallowed. If you want students to view the recording video on-demand, please set it as on-demand allowed.

permisSubtitle.publicTip1.message: Publish to the course's Resources (students can view it) and My Resources

permisSubtitle.publicTip2.message: Publish to My Resources only (visible to you only)

permisSubtitle.confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the captions?

permisSubtitle.videoNameType4.message: Multiple-source video (Instructor + students + screen + audio remix/splice)

permisSubtitle.publicTip3.message: Succeed! It takes a while to publish the video. The video will be displayed in ULearning after the it is published.

permisSubtitle.subTitleTip.message: The captions is being generated. It will be displayed automatically after generation. Please check it later.

permisSubtitle.jointVideoTip.message: To combine multiple video streams from this session to display in a single video screen, the platform needs to splice/remix these videos from multiple sources. The process takes 30-60 minutes.

permisSubtitle.jointVideoTip1.message: Closing the window does not affect video splicing. You can click the  Splice Videos button in the upper right corner to check the video splicing progress.

knowledgePoint.importErrTip7.message: Network error! Please refresh and try again.
